segments.text: I'm looking for an MP - 3 player . Which brand is of the highest quality ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This model is very popular with ladies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have a look at it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , it's multi-functional . Besides playing music , it can also be used to store documents and make recordings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have this model in white ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but we have it in yellow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I'll take the yellow one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please wait a second . I'll get it for you .
segments.speaker: S1
